titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Cooperative Corporation Papers
titlestmt.author: compiled by Janet Elaine Gertz

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 10:41

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: Two bound volumes: one with the minutes of the Yale Cooperative Society (1885-1891); the other a ledger for 1896-1898 and 1903-1905. Also included are a few clippings, printed matter related to the Society, and a copy of its constitution.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The volume of minutes was the gift of the Yale Cooperative Corporation, 1902. The ledger was purchased in 1978.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Cooperative Corporation Papers. Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Yale Cooperative Society was founded in 1885. In 1893 it was incorporated as the Yale Cooperative Corporation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two bound volumes: one with the minutes of the Yale Cooperative Society (1885-1891); the other a ledger for 1896-1898 and 1903-1905. Also included are a few clippings, printed matter related to the Society, and a copy of its constitution.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The papers of the Yale Cooperative Corporation consist of two bound volumes and a few loose items removed from the volumes. The first volume is a manuscript notebook containing minutes of the Yale Cooperative Society between 1885 and 1891, its constitution, and a few clippings and minor publications of the Society. The other volume is a ledger of the Yale Cooperative Corporation, kept for the years 1896 through 1898, and 1903 through 1905.

did.unittitle: "Records of the Yale Cooperative Society, Volume I": minutes, constitution, clippings
